title: Growth of cities in Afro-Euroasia and commerce

content.question: Which of the following was a major cause for the growth of cities throughout Afro-Eurasia from 800 C.E. to 1350 C.E.?

choices.label: The decreasing need for agricultural workers

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
